reviewText:
All 4 movies are full screen.  There is no wide screen option.  The product description didn't say so when I ordered, but hopefully it will now because I contacted amazon.

The quality is comparable to VHS.  I don't know what I expected.  It was the easiest and quickest way for me to see Teknolust, and I'm a big fan of Secretary, so I bought it.  Needless to say I'll be buying the Blu-ray of Secretary for about $7, because this copy is practically unwatchable.
